issue.title: audiobookbay.lu
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

79219-5540

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://audiobookbay.lu/abss/charlie-chan-carries-on-1930-earl-derr-biggers/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Fanboy's Annoyances, EasyList Cookie List

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist

### Other

AdGuard Experimental filter

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

EasyList Hebrew

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Hide your User-Agent (specify in comment below, if used custom value), Mask your IP address (specify in comment below, if used custom value)

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Fake download links remain and can be removed with the following filters:
##[href^="/download"]
or
##td span a:has-text(Torrent Free Downloads)

##.ski

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/156966833/ddfb8992-4a71-4848-a9ff-61644fe17d5a)
</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/156966833/c24b263c-e99e-482f-933a-4681b9bee54a)

</details>


### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: Just realised that they use a few other domains, so it should be a wildcard instead

issue.title: hikaritube.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [NSFW] [https://hikaritube.com/video.php?id=118422](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fhikaritube.com%2Fvideo.php%3Fid%3D118422) ### Comment > This issue is caused by Adguard on iPhone's inability to handle iframes properly. There is no specific rule in place to hide the ad placeholder. On PC, blocking the script reduces the size to 0, effectively hiding the ad frame. However, on iPhone, the iframe remains visible, which is why it's expected that the ad frame does not disappear. If there are any other reasons contributing to this behavior, please let me know for future reference. ### [NSFW] Screenshots [Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/nbslo16md68owksws8cc8s8s04k4cskkeg8gu3dnrk.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/2y8g2isy5ayooksk8k484ww0k4wgoo0m8lmqv6c40g.jpg?nc=1) [Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ij6t3ia3ng0sss04wgogk440kss4g4wppgz1oe77v4.jpg?nc=1) ### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.3 DNS filtering: | server: `https://doh.quad9.net/dns-query`
